snippet: Doctors said Malala Yousafzai, the teenager attacked for advocating girls’ education, would be staying with her family before returning for further surgery to her skull.
abstract: Malala Yousafzai, Pakistani schoolgirl shot in the head by Taliban for advocating education for girls, is discharged from British hospital; doctors say she has made 'excellent progress' and will be staying with her family nearby before returning for further surgery to rebuild her skull.
lead_paragraph: Doctors said Malala Yousafzai, the teenager attacked for advocating girls’ education, would be staying with her family before returning for further surgery to her skull.

headline.seo: Malala Yousafzai, Shot by Pakistani Taliban, Is Discharged From Hospital
headline.main: Girl Shot by Pakistani Taliban Is Discharged From Hospital
headline.print_headline: Girl Shot by Pakistani Taliban Is Discharged From Hospital
